E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/3/1973
Subject: Progress of Bill Atkinson
Dear Sir,
Bill Atkinson is doing pretty good at A Appleton Foxes!
He has an ERA of 3.58, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/8/1973
Subject: Progress of Terry Cornutt
Dear Sir,
Terry Cornutt has an ERA of 3.91 at A Appleton Foxes!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
